quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Pink
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, headquarters, people. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Complete the following quote from Blazing Saddles:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a four hundred dollar handcar.

questions.question: The following can be heard in what 2002 movie:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 28 Days Later

questions.question: In the movie Pretty in Pink, Duckie is Andies boyfriend.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Who played the Bouncer in the CATS club where Duckie was always getting kicked out in the movie Pretty in Pink?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Andrew Dice Clay

questions.question: Who placed the bomb at the headquarters of Bonds Russian ally in The World Is Not Enough?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bullion

questions.question: What saw movie contains this quote?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Saw

questions.question: In the film The World Is Not Enough, M is held captive in which tower in Istanbul?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maiden Tower

questions.question: In The World Is Not Enough, while skiing, 007 and Elektra are chased by what kind of vehicles at the pipelines end?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Parahawk helicopters

questions.question: When did the all-time favorite movie Pretty in Pink come out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Feb 1986

questions.question: Who does Duckie fight with in the hallway after he overhears him talking badly about Andie in the movie Pretty in Pink?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steff

questions.question: In the movie Pretty in Pink, Andie’s love interest finally makes the big move on her. How does he make it?

options.text: By sending a message through a friend
By calling her on the phone
By chatting in the computer lab

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: By chatting in the computer lab

questions.question: How was 007s car destroyed in Zukovskys caviar factory in the film The World Is Not Enough?

options.text: It was burned by a flame thrower.
It was destroyed by a rocket fired from a Parahawk helicopter.
It was destroyed by a helicopters giant razor blade.
It was crushed by a Soviet tank.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was destroyed by a helicopters giant razor blade.

questions.question: In the movie Pretty in Pink, Molly Ringwald played the leading lady. What was the name of her character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Andie Walsh

questions.question: From what two people did Andie get the two dresses to make her prom dress in the movie Pretty in Pink?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her father and Iona

questions.question: What device ignited the bomb that killed sir Robert King in The World Is Not Enough?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Collar pin

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Blazing Saddles and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, happyness, blazing. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The movie The Pursuit of Happyness was released in 2008.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Complete the following dialogue from Blazing Saddles:

options.text: Im not used to public speaking.
Im not very good with speeches.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im not used to public speaking.

questions.question: At the end of Blazing Saddles, Bart rides by Jim, who is lying by the side of the road, taking a nap, with a bag of popcorn in his hand. Complete the following dialogue:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nowhere special

questions.question: This 2009 movie is about a couple, their luekemia stricken daughter and the lengths at which they go to save her.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: My Sisters Keeper

questions.question: In the film Blazing Saddles, after Sheriff Bart defeats Mongo (one of Taggerts henchmen) - and puts him in jail - Bart and Jim start asking Mongo questions about why he was sent to Rock Ridge to defeat Sheriff Bart. Mongo mentions something about Hedley Lamarr and how he cares about where the choo-choo go. Bart asks why Lamarr would care about where the choo-choo go. Complete Mongos line:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Life

questions.question: In the movie Blazing Saddles, Sheriff Bart meets Jim at the Rock Ridge jail, where he was held overnight for drunken behavior. Finish the following quote:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jim

questions.question: Which 2002 movie was based on the life of real life musician Wladyslaw Szpilman (played by Adrian Brody)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Pianist

questions.question: In the film Blazing Saddles, Governor Le Petomane receives an urgent telegram from the citizens of Rock Ridge requesting a new sheriff to replace the sheriff that had been murdered. The governor, who is in a meeting with his yes men, says, Holy underwear! Sheriff murdered! Innocent women and children blown to bits! We have to protect our phoney baloney jobs here, gentlemen! We must do something about this immediately! Immediately! Immediately!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harrumph! Harrumph! Harrumph!

questions.question: If it wasnt for the star getting her revenge at the end of this 2003 movie it would have been completely depressing.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kill Bill Vol 1

questions.question: This movie made in 2002 and directed by Denzel Washington tugged at our heartstrings while we watched a young man deal with his abusive past.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Antwone Fisher

questions.question: Complete the following dialogue from the film Blazing Saddles which takes place when Bart and Jim make a quick getaway from Hedley Lamarrs villain talent search once it is discovered that Bart is black:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I hate that cliche!

questions.question: Bart, disguised as a Klansman, has infiltrated Hedley Lamarrs talent search for villains to overtake Rock Ridge in the film Blazing Saddles. In describing his qualifications, how does he respond below:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Through the Vatican?

questions.question: Which 2004 movie starring Don Cheadle, was about the hotelier Paul Rusesabagina?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hotel Rwanda

questions.question: This 2004 movie starring Ryan Gosling and Rachel McAdams, was about the summer love of a young teenage couple that are eventually separated due to social differences.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Notebook

questions.question: In the movie Blazing Saddles, after Taggart and his henchmen first attack Rock Ridge, the townspeople meet in the church to discuss how to restore order to the town and to replace the murdered sheriff. They finally settle on wiring the governor for a replacement. At the end, they return to church services. Complete the following lines:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Duck

options.text: Because they have witnessed a murder
Because they have perpetrated a crime
Because they want to get closer to girls
Because they like wearing stockings and wigs

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mean Girls and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, screen, quote. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Why did Janis Ian hate Regina George in the comedy movie Mean Girls?

options.text: Janis wished she was the queen bee instead of Regina.
Regina said Janis had slept with the entire football team.
Regina was rich, and made fun of how poor Janis was.
Regina started a rumor that Janis was a lesbian.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Regina started a rumor that Janis was a lesbian.

questions.question: This actress was originally cast as Cady in Mean Girls, but the producers decided that she was a better fit for the character of queen bee Regina George.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rachel McAdams

questions.question: In what year did the movie Mean Girls hit American theatres?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2004

questions.question: In the movie Mean Girls, what was the name of the academic club Ms. Norbury wanted Cady to join?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Mathletes

questions.question: This actress first crossed the screen in a remake of The Parent Trap. In Mean Girls, she played the new student, Cady Heron.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lindsay Lohan

questions.question: What 1980 comedy movie starred Chevy Chase and Bill Murray, and contained the funny line Hey, everybody! Were all gonna get laid!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Caddyshack

questions.question: In Mean Girls, what present from her parents did Gretchen have to reject because Regina told her that she wasnt allowed to wear it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gold hoop earrings

questions.question: This song on the Sleepless in Seattle soundtrack is performed by Nat King Cole and contains the following lyrics:

options.text: d now the purple  dusk of  twilight time
ways reminding me that were apart.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stardust

questions.question: At the end of the movie Mean Girls, Cady ended up with Aaron Samuels.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Tina Fey, who adapted the script for Mean Girls from the book Queen Bees and Wannabees, used to be head writer for which TV show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Saturday Night Live

questions.question: Finish these lyrics from the song Karazy performed by Jackass star Chris Pontius:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im feelin lazy

questions.question: The 1979 comedy-drama movie Being There ends with this quote.

options.text: Nothing is as difficult as living
Life is a state of mind

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Life is a state of mind

questions.question: In the movie Mean Girls, Cadys family moved to Evanston, Illinois so Cadys mom could take on a new job. Where did Cady and her family use to live?

options.text: Los Angeles, where her parents were actors
Africa, where her parents were anthropologists
Rome, where her parents were theologians
Australia, where her parents were aborigines

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Africa, where her parents were anthropologists

questions.question: This character may have forgotten his name but he remembered how to drive. His girlfriend,
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jason Bourne

questions.question: What happens to Regina in the movie Mean Girls, after Janis reveals that she and Cady plotted to destroy Reginas queen bee status?

options.text: She is hit by a bus.
She becomes a modern day Mother Theresa.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She is hit by a bus.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Aliens and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, title, bears. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the movie Aliens, who were the tough hombres that accompanied Ripley back to LV-426?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Colonial Marines

questions.question: Timothy Treadwell made the brown bears in Alaskas Katmai National Park his passion and obsession.  For thirteen summers he lived among the bears, to the disapproval of the park rangers, filming and writing about them. In 2003 a brown bear attacked Treadwell and his girlfriend, Amie Huguenard, killing and devouring both.  Using Timothy Treadwels footage and interviews with his friends, Werner Herzog, made this documentary about Treadwells life.

options.text: you know the name of this film?
The Bears of Katmai National Park

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grizzly Man

questions.question: How does Bonds wife, Tracy Draco, die at the end of the film On Her Majestys Secret Service?

options.text: She is shot by a submachine gun.
She is caught in an avalanche.
She is poisoned  by a glass of wine.
She falls from a ski lift.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She is shot by a submachine gun.

questions.question: In the movie Aliens, what did Cpl. Hicks keep handy for close encounters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shotgun

questions.question: Which jazz musician sang  Weve Got  All The Time In The World, in On Her Majestys Secret Service?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Louis Armstrong

questions.question: In the hit movie Aliens, who/what did Privates Hudson and Vasquez discover, via motion tracker, on their initial sweep of the complex?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hamster

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dwayne

questions.question: Which character, portrayed by Ilse Steppat, is Blofelds henchwoman in On Her Majestys Secret Service?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Irma Bunt

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False
